  • Constructor Details

    • SqliteUserDAO

      public SqliteUserDAO()
      Constructor for the SQLite user data access object. Connects to the instance of the database and creates the table if not already present.

  • Method Details

      used for testing
      Parameters:

    • isLogin

      public boolean isLogin(String email, String password) throws SQLException
      Checks that the user has provided valid credentials to login
      Parameters:
      email - The email entered by the user
      password - The email entered by the user
      Returns:
      True if the given credentials match an existing user, false if not.
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception thrown by database

    • setDailyActivity

      public void setDailyActivity(Timestamp lastActive, Integer streak, String email) throws SQLException
      updates the database with the user's daily activity streak
      Parameters:
      lastActive - the date the user last logged in
      streak - the user's current activity streak
      email - the user's email (unique identifier)
      Throws:
      SQLException - database exception

    • setActivity

      public void setActivity(String email)
      sets the user's daily activity as an accessible value in the user object is separate from the setDailyActivity as the user instance has to be set in the loginController
      Parameters:
      email - the user's email
